channel.title: Hobbies on Kolton Bodnovich
channel.description: Recent content in Hobbies on Kolton Bodnovich

item.title: Hobbies
item.description: In addition to making graphics, I like to make other things as well. Here are a few things that I've made. Wall Art This is an origami piece made from cardstock. The piece on the left was designed using Cricut Design studio, and the piece on the right is a version made from cardstock. Wedding Backdrop In September 2019, my mom and I made this backdrop for a family wedding. The flowers were cut using a Cricut and are made out of cardstock and old jewelry.
